Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png'}
{3: 'The girl in black never shows up again, but Roland sees marks of Punishing on the ground pointing to another place.'}
{3: "These marks aren't visible to those without Punishing affinity. Roland knows the message is specifically left for him."}
{3: 'The marks continue along the path, extending into the other side of the forest.'}
{3: 'Roland turns back to look at the roof, but Lamia is long gone.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "(Did she go stealth? No, it can't be...)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(Tsk... So she ended up running.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(I did think about this possibility and had a plan... But whatever.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(I just have to do this alone now.)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland lets out a sigh and follows the invisible Punishing trail out of the house.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory359.png'}
{3: 'The girl in black calmly stands in the center of the circle on a cliff. She seems to have waited a long time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Just do what you have to. Now that you have showed up, your plot must have come to an end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Where is the villain? Whatever you have up your sleeve, bring it up. I'm ready.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland plays his last card. He is waiting for the opponent to draw their last from the bottom of the deck.'}
{3: 'The girl in black lets out a sigh, as if she is giving Roland his final sentence.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Time for serious business.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '...(Broken, inarticulate mechanical noises are heard amongst incomprehensible words.)'}
{2: '???', 3: "...You want blood. Here's a better target.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Cinderelik... Can I... kill? Can I...?'}
{3: 'The girl remains silent, showing no sign of disapproval.'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "Perhaps that's why Mister sent you here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '"Loki" suppressed once again—Voodoo entering target zone.'}
{3: '—A giant black shadow flies off from the cliff behind Cinderelik.'}
{3: 'It launches upward, severing the rising moon before hovering in the air.'}
{3: '—Then it dives past Roland and Cinderelik, and hovers again. Its long and slim artificial muscle wings swing across the forest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Is this our target? The one Mister wants to recruit?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Yes, do what you need to do. This time, stay away from any targets unrelated to the mission.'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Unremarkable. I, be gentle. Save, energy. Give, his, complete body, to Mister.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '...Do you look down on me that much?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: "Look down or not, it's up to us to determine. We will use our full strength if you prove yourself to be stronger than you look.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Then "Loki" will wreck havoc. You may not want to witness that.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'You sound very confident. I only have one question left.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What were you going to do if I decided not to leave that house?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Cinderelik doesn't admit or deny anything."}
{3: 'She just continues to gaze at Roland calmly.'}
{3: 'Cinderelik still gives no answer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Cinderelik? Can I start?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '...I really want to meet that "Mister" of yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "If I get to see him, I'd like to make a complaint regarding this invitation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The staff he sent displayed extremely poor attitudes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl doesn't reply, only bows instead. She then waves at the black figure in the sky—"}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Great, we have one poker face and one maniac. Surely you don't look like you want to talk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "...Fine, let's use violence first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland points his chain blade and gun at Voodoo in the sky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: '"Loki" is driving me nuts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'So we are going to take turns... to play.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Can you explain to Mister if I hit him too hard?', 4: '1'}
{3: "She doesn't answer, but Voodoo takes this as a silent approval."}
{3: "Cinderelik disappears from Roland's vision, leaving him with—"}
{1: '1', 3: '"Voodoo" soars into the sky again, then dives rapidly toward Roland\'s position with her back facing the moon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "I'm free! No longer suppressed by you... This feels great! Fantastic!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Who are we going to kill?! Who? This guy? Is it him?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Yes. Kill him if you find him too weak. We take turns.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Tsk... You can argue as long as you want, but can I go?', 4: '1'}
